markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Behemoth Hippopotamus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=700)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Behemoth hippopotamuses stand taller than elephants. They spend less time out of water than their smaller kin. Behemoth hippos are omnivorous, and many enjoy the taste of meat.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Behemoth Hippopotamus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=700)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Perception** +19; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent (imprecise) 30 feet](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +18, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +17

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +4

**Con** +7

**Int** -4

**Wis** +5

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Deep Breath** The behemoth hippopotamus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 29 

**Fort** +22 

**Ref** +17 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 190

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +23 ([deadly d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+10 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +21,
**Damage** 2d8+9 bludgeoning

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" />  40 feet

**Capsize** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) The behemoth hippopotamus tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. The behemoth hippopotamus must succeed at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check with a DC of 30 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the hippo) or the pilot's [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) DC, whichever is higher.

**Double Chomp** <actions string="Single Action" />  The behemoth hippo makes a jaws Strike targeting two creatures adjacent to each other. Roll the attack and damage once, and apply it to each creature separately. An Engulfing Chomp counts as two attacks for the multiple attack penalty.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Medium, 2d12+10 bludgeoning, Rupture 26.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, foot, DC 29

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-139" />
name: Behemoth Hippopotamus
